magic8ball.title: Magic 8 Ball
magic8ball.description: Make your own Magic 8 Ball to answer questions with a shake.

truthOrDare.title: Truth or Dare
truthOrDare.description: The classic party game of truth and dares!

neverHaveIEver.title: Never Have I Ever
neverHaveIEver.description: A fun and revealing party game that gets everyone talking!

whoIsMostLikely.title: Who Is Most Likely
whoIsMostLikely.description: Find out who's most likely to do unexpected things!

wouldYouRather.title: Would You Rather
wouldYouRather.description: Make tough choices between two interesting scenarios!

mafia.title: Mafia
mafia.description: A thrilling social deduction game where players must find the mafia members among them!

undercover.title: Undercover
undercover.description: A party game of deception and deduction

guessNumber.title: Guess This Number
guessNumber.description: A fun drinking game for couples and groups

charades.title: Charades
charades.description: Act out words and phrases in this classic party game!

hedbanz.title: Hedbanz
hedbanz.description: Guess what you are in this hilarious guessing game!

sexDice.title: Sex Dice
sexDice.description: Roll the dice for a fun and spicy adventure!

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
